col1_html.content: Corporate Event Venue at The Michelangelo Hotel in Midtown

col2_html.content:
Luxury Meetings & Events

With four meeting rooms accommodating up to 80 people, The Michelangelo is a sophisticated corporate event venue for a prestigious event in the heart of New York. Authentic artwork, Murano glass, splendid marble floors, impressive chandeliers, wonderful velvets and precious imported silks welcome event guests to a warm, stylish atmosphere of authentic Italian luxury. The hotel’s catering service, a dedicated professional staff and the elegant, enchanting ambience make every event a resounding success.

The Michelangelo New York meeting and corporate event spaces in NYC are accessible. For more information, please view our Accessibility Statement.
